login_user.description: Zabbix user name, used to authenticate against the server.

interfaces.description: List of interfaces to be created for the host (see example below). Available values are: dns, ip, main, port, type and useip. Please review the interface documentation for more information on the supported properties https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/2.0/manual/appendix/api/hostinterface/definitions#host_interface

server_url.description: Url of Zabbix server, with protocol (http or https).

visible_name.description: Visible name of the host in Zabbix.

state.description: State of the host. On C(present), it will create if host does not exist or update the host if the associated data is different. On C(absent) will remove a host if it exists.

proxy.description: The name of the Zabbix Proxy to be used

host_groups.description: List of host groups the host is part of.

force.description: Overwrite the host configuration, even if already present

link_templates.description: List of templates linked to the host.

host_name.description: Name of the host in Zabbix. host_name is the unique identifier used and cannot be updated using this module.
